name: THE POLICE FOUNDATION AND INSTITUTE
briefDescription: The Police Foundation & Institute is a multidisciplinary think tank that brings together the citizens & the police to drive a nationwide campaign for police reform & transformation. The organisation has 2 limbs: Indian Police Foundation (IPF), an independent think tank & policy advocacy wing and Indian Police Institute (IPI), a professional institute for the Indian Police, providing a vibrant platform dedicated to research, ideas generation, standards-setting, capacity building & evidence-based policing.  An eminent Board chaired by Prakash Singh, the legendary crusader for police reforms, provides visionary and strategic leadership to the organisation; N. Ramachandran, former DGP is the Founder and President.
